Package com.company

Class Card

java.lang.Object
com.company.Elements
com.company.Card
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
BeetrootCard, CherryBombCard, MushroomCard, PeaShooterCard, RepeaterCard, SnowPeaShooterCard, SunFlowerCard, WallNutCard
public class Card
extends Elements
This is Card class.its a kind of elements. It handles the works related to This type of element It extends Element class. each card has a value and if player has enough suns he can use that card after plant a flower and use a specific card it must be unreachable for a while
Version:
1.0
Author:
Mahdi Rahmani & Nami Modarressi
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Card

      public Card​(int[] position, java.lang.String elementPath, java.lang.String cursorImageAddress, GameState gameState, int value, int chargingTime)
      This is the constructor of this class create a new Element with a given position
      Parameters:
      position - the x&y coordinates
      elementPath - the path of element gif or image
      cursorImageAddress - the path of card image
      gameState - the game state
      value - the card value
      chargingTime - the time needed for charging a card again
